title: Himekishi to Camping Car - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Aristocracy   Demi-Humans   Male Protagonist   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Tsundere   World Travel
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description: The protagonist, a former corporate slave, and the RV he poured everything he owned into remodeling, were both sent to another world?! Upon first arriving in the fantasy world, a princess knight stammered, “K-kill!”… Powered by a solar battery, the custom RV roams the new world. Fitted with Japanese-style tatami mat flooring, upon them are enshrined the table-heater Kotatsu and oranges. The noble and gallant princess knight settles into a leisurely lifestyle, as body and mind slowly deteriorate…>
